net.commotionwireless.olsrinfo
Class TxtInfo

Object
  net.commotionwireless.olsrinfo.TxtInfo

public class TxtInfo
extends Object

Scrape the output of olsrd's txtinfo plugin into arrays of Strings. Written as part of the Commotion Wireless project

See Also:
OLSR Configuration and Management

command

public String[][] command(String cmd)

twohop

public String[][] twohop()
2-hop neighbors on the mesh

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of IP address, SYM, MPR, MPRS, Willingness, and 2 Hop Neighbors

neighbors

public String[][] neighbors()
immediate neighbors on the mesh

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of IP address, SYM, MPR, MPRS, Willingness, and 2 Hop Neighbors

links

public String[][] links()
direct connections on the mesh, i.e. nodes with direct IP connectivity via Ad-hoc

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of Local IP, Remote IP, Hysteresis, LQ, NLQ, and Cost

routes

public String[][] routes()
IP routes to nodes on the mesh

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of Destination, Gateway IP, Metric, ETX, and Interface

hna

public String[][] hna()
Host and Network Association (for supporting dynamic internet gateways)

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of Destination and Gateway

mid

public String[][] mid()
Multiple Interface Declaration

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of IP address and Aliases

topology

public String[][] topology()
topology of the whole mesh

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of Destination IP, Last hop IP, LQ, NLQ, and Cost

interfaces

public String[][] interfaces()
the network interfaces that olsrd is aware of

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of Destination IP, Last hop IP, LQ, NLQ, and Cost

gateways

public String[][] gateways()
the gateways to other networks that this node knows about

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of Status, Gateway IP, ETX, Hopcount, Uplink, Downlink, IPv4, IPv6, Prefix

main

                 throws IOException
for testing from the command line
